title: Graph of binomial distribution given parameters

content.question: Which of the following graphs represents a binomial distribution with n = 20 and p = 0.25?

choices.label: The numbers 2 through 18 appear on the horizontal axis, in increments of 2. The numbers 0 through 0.25 appear on the vertical axis, in increments of 0.05. The histogram shows 19 bars centered at each of the numbers from 1 to 19, in increments of 1, on the horizontal axis. The histogram is skewed to the right. The highest bar is centered at 1 and has a height of 0.25. The heights of the bars decrease sharply as you move from left to right, ending with heights approximately equal to 0 for the bars corresponding to 17, 18, and 19 successes, respectively.

The numbers 0 through 18 appear on the horizontal axis, in increments of 2. The numbers 0 through 0.25 appear on the vertical axis, in increments of 0.05. The histogram shows a bar centered at each of the numbers from 0 to 19, in increments of 1, on the horizontal axis. The histogram is bimodal. The bars from 0 to 10 are approximately bell shaped centered at 5 successes. The height of the bar at 5 successes is 0.10. The heights of the bars at 0 and 10 are very closed to 0, but the bar at 10 is a little higher than the bar at 0.The bars from 11 to 19 are also approximately bell shaped centered at 15 successes. The height of the bar at 15 successes is 0.10. The heights of the bar at 11 and 19 are approximately 0.02 and 0.01, respectively.

The numbers 0 through 12 appear on the horizontal axis, in increments of 2. The numbers 0 through 0.25 appear on the vertical axis, in increments of 0.05. The histogram shows a bar centered at each of the numbers from 0 to 12, in increments of 1, in the horizontal axis. The histogram is approximately bell shaped centered at 5 successes. The height of the bar at 5 successes is 0.20. The heights of the bars at 0 and 12 are very close to 0.

The numbers 8 through 20 appear on the horizontal axis, in increments of 2. The numbers 0 through 0.25 appear on the vertical axis, in increments of 0.05. The histogram shows a bar centered at each of the points from 8 to 20, in increments of 1, on the horizontal axis. The histogram is approximately bell shaped centered at 15 successes. The height of the bar at 15 successes is 0.20. The height of the bars at 8 and 20 are close to 0.

The numbers 4 through 16 appear on the horizontal axis, in increments of 2. The numbers 0 through 0.25 appear on the vertical axis, in increments of 0.05. The histogram shows a bar centered at each of the points from 3 to 17, in increments of 1, on the horizontal axis. The histogram is bell shaped, completely symmetric, and centered at 10 successes. The height of the bar at 10 successes is approximately 0.18. The height of the bars at 3 and 17 are close to 0.

content.answer: The numbers 0 through 12 appear on the horizontal axis, in increments of 2. The numbers 0 through 0.25 appear on the vertical axis, in increments of 0.05. The histogram shows a bar centered at each of the numbers from 0 to 12, in increments of 1, in the horizontal axis. The histogram is approximately bell shaped centered at 5 successes. The height of the bar at 5 successes is 0.20. The heights of the bars at 0 and 12 are very close to 0.
